participant_1.background:
My spouse works in the medical field, which allows me to enjoy my kittens and weekend adventures.
I enjoy entertaining my former students and catching up on their lives.
I have a soft spot for poodles, so I would love to have a plush poodle in my nursery.
I have been to Mardi Gras in New Orleans, and it was an amazing experience.
I am glad that my wife's cancer is in remission and that she is able to enjoy the outdoors with me.

participant_2.background:
I'm going to visit my brother in another city.
i blog about salt water aquarium ownership.
i trust in god.
I am an aspiring male model while my mother looks after my grandmother.
My siblings are my favorite people because they are always there for me and we have so much fun together.

content.text: Hi there, how are you doing?
Hey there! I'm doing great! I'm about to visit my brother in another city. How are you doing today?
I'm doing well. I'm just relaxing at home with my kittens.
That sounds nice. I love kittens! What are their names?
Their names are Snowball and Mittens. They're both very cute.
I'm sure they are! I have a dog named Max. He's a great dog.
I'm glad to hear that. I love animals.
Me too! I'm an aspiring male model.
Oh wow, that's cool! I've never met a male model before.
Yeah, it's a lot of work, but it's also a lot of fun.
I can imagine. I'm sure it's a lot of traveling.
Yeah, I travel a lot for work. But I get to see a lot of cool places.
That's the best part!
Yeah, it is!
Do you have any other hobbies?
Yeah, I blog about salt water aquarium ownership.
That's really interesting! I've never heard of that before.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun. I have a really cool saltwater aquarium at home.
I'd love to see it sometime.
Yeah, you should! It's really cool.
Cool! I'll have to come by and take a look sometime.
Awesome! I'd love to show you it.
